description:
Sayo Samonji is having nightmares, so his brothers want to plant lavender to help him sleep. And with all the new Sword Warriors arriving, the citadel is getting crowded, so it`s Hakata to the rescue with his buried treasure!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: June: We`re Counting On You from Now On, Too!
水無月 これからもよろしく
